channel.title: Interview Candidate Discussion - July
channel.description:
This thread will be used to share and discuss any potential candidates for the interview in the Mopar Monthly issue that will be published at the end of July. Notable points will be placed into the OP.
[ul][li]MoparIsTheBest[/li] [li]drubrkletern[/li] [li]Krackkid[/li] [li]Tree[/li] [li]Davidi2[/li][/ul]

item.title: Interview Candidate Discussion - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

This month’s candidate will be Davidi2. Questions for him will be discussed in the Interview Questions - Davidi2 thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Interview Candidate Discussion - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I would prefer Tree not to be interviewed, he has always just been in it for the power and I think that would make him think he is someone he is not. I’m available on IRC a decent amount of time usually, but I don’t care if Davidi2 is interviewed for this month.

Alright, the candidates are you and Davidi2 for this month. The only thing with interviewing you is that I think it would be a big and popular interview that I think Flame_ would like to be a part of.

Read full topic

item.description:

I would prefer Tree not to be interviewed, he has always just been in it for the power and I think that would make him think he is someone he is not. I’m available on IRC a decent amount of time usually, but I don’t care if Davidi2 is interviewed for this month.

item.title: Interview Candidate Discussion - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I thought I’d just been using this as a diary/notepad to store my thoughts

I sent him as a PM a few days ago but didn’t get a reply (he hasn’t logged into the forum) so if you could get ahold of him that’d be great! Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Interview Candidate Discussion - July
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I will try to get ahold of Moparisthebest for you, it would be nice to interview him.

Read full topic

item.title: Interview Candidate Discussion - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I don’t see anything positive coming out of an interview with Krackkid and I think the MM would be better off if we interviewed people who have contributed to the community in some way. The same applies to drub and so those two will not be considered for this month’s interview candidate.

As MITB has not replied to the PM I sent him, the two available candidates are Tree and Davidi2, so I think that Davidi2 will be this month’s candidate.

Read full topic

item.title: Interview Candidate Discussion - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I’m leaning towards Davidi2 for this month’s issue. I would like to interview MITB but I also think Flame_ would like to be a part of that so I’m unsure if I should make him the candidate.

Read full topic

item.title: Interview Candidate Discussion - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Here are some questions submitted for Davidi2. They’ll need some work before submission but a few of them are interesting questions that might not need any changes.

1) Why did you quit being staff? (besides the obvious got tired of it/well deserved!) 2) is there any chance davidscape will return? 3) Why has your personality/attitude changed on the forums? 4) how does it feel having the most post count on the forums for well over two years running?( I think two years? ) 5) Did you ever think you would be mod on here? How did you feel when you first became mod? 6) As a semi-veteran moparian if there was any advice you could give to the newer members what would it be? 7) Do you still program? If so, what language(s)? 8) Tell us a little bit about yourself. Job,age, etc 9) Do you have any future goals in either IRL or on Mopar itself? 10) If there was any one thing you could do on mopar for the better what would it be, and why? 11) Anything else you would like to say?

Read full topic

item.title: Interview Candidate Discussion - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Loveandpower has nominated Tree and Davidi2. I think we have the final five candidates for consideration here. I’ll post in the MM thread and ask for their opinions on the candidate list.

Read full topic

item.title: Interview Candidate Discussion - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Kickingjamie also nominated drub which I think could be an interesting interview as he is quite a popular character on the forums. I’m going to also go ahead and nominate Krackkid for exactly the same reasons.

Read full topic

item.title: Interview Candidate Discussion - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Kickingjamie nominated MoparIsTheBest on IRC and it’d probably be worth shooting him a PM to see about his availability and interest in taking part in an interview. I’ll PM him once we’ve selected the candidates but if he doesn’t reply in time we’ll just have to go to someone else and possibly interview him next month.

Read full topic
